content:
claim to anything at all, he has a just, prior claim to
his own body. And perhaps this needn’t be argued for here anyway, since,
as I mentioned, the arguments against abortion we are looking at do grant
that the woman has a right to decide what happens in and to her body.
But although they do grant it, I have tried to show that they do not take
seriously what is done in granting it. I suggest the same thing will reappear
even more clearly when we turn away from cases in which the mother’s life
